Description: This is a Boolean string used to search Manufacturing Engineers on Linkedin. This also incorporates the field operators in the string
String: ("manufacturing engineer" OR "manufacturing engineering") AND ((title:"manufacturing engineer") NOT(title:"head"  OR title:"manager"))
